src.GameObjects

Class EntityHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.GameObjects.EntityHandler

  • public class EntityHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all FOREGROUND entities. Tiles are also entities, but they are handled separately in the Map class. This is to improve performance. This class draws all of the other entities and allows for easy access to all entities.

      • drawEntities

        public static void drawEntities(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                                Camera cam)
        Draw all of the entities to the screen
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object to draw the entities to
        cam - The camera to use to see which entities must be drawn

      • updateEntities

        public static void updateEntities()
        Update all of the entities present. First add all entities that should be added to the list. Then remove all entities that should be removed from the list. This prevents entities being modified while new entities are added, which causes reference problems.

      • removeAllEnemies

        public static void removeAllEnemies()
        Remove all enemies from the entity handler
